channel.title: Comments on: Accessing DVD menus on Android tablets

item.title: By: Nick Camel
item.dc:creator: Nick Camel
item.content:encoded:
Excellent. This comes down to two steps

1. “Make sure the “AUDIO_TS” and “VIDEO_TS” folders are children of “DVD””

2. Use VLC to play THE FOLDER “DVD”. Long press on DVD and a play button pops up in the menu.

item.title: By: Arfa Hashmi
item.dc:creator: Arfa Hashmi
item.description: Very helpful suggestions that help in the optimizing website. Thank you for valuable suggestions. <a href="http://softcracks.cf/dvd-audio-extractor-mac/" rel="nofollow">DVD Audio Extractor Mac</a>
item.content:encoded: Very helpful suggestions that help in the optimizing website. Thank you for valuable suggestions. DVD Audio Extractor Mac

item.description: So pleased it was of use and hope your back improves
item.content:encoded: So pleased it was of use and hope your back improves

item.title: By: Kate
item.dc:creator: Kate
item.description: Was about to give up when I found your tutorial. Thank you so much for going to the trouble to share your findings. This was by far the easiest way to transfer the DVD including the Menu. I am using it for a DVD containing exercises for my back and that only makes sense WITH a menu....
item.content:encoded:
Was about to give up when I found your tutorial.
Thank you so much for going to the trouble to share your findings.
This was by far the easiest way to transfer the DVD including the Menu.
I am using it for a DVD containing exercises for my back and that only makes sense WITH a menu….

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description: I'm afraid I can't offer any assistance. I suggest you talk to the player app folks.
item.content:encoded: I’m afraid I can’t offer any assistance. I suggest you talk to the player app folks.

item.title: By: Nick
item.dc:creator: Nick
item.description: Hi i have the dvd and i copy all folder with .vob files and some .ifo and start the daroon player and the menu video with scenes selections and play movie i click pop-up in screen and nothing dont appers the menu navigation why?please help me thanks
item.content:encoded: Hi i have the dvd and i copy all folder with .vob files and some .ifo and start the daroon player and the menu video with scenes selections and play movie i click pop-up in screen and nothing dont appers the menu navigation why?please help me thanks

item.title: By: Android: How to read DVD (video_ts & audio_ts). | ssinfod
item.dc:creator: Android: How to read DVD (video_ts & audio_ts). | ssinfod

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description: I seem to recall there was a little 'joystick' cross control in the bottom right of these screen that lets you move up/down left/right between selectable items in the menu. I can't recall how you display it though.Perhaps touch an item or swipe from an edge?
item.content:encoded: I seem to recall there was a little ‘joystick’ cross control in the bottom right of these screen that lets you move up/down left/right between selectable items in the menu. I can’t recall how you display it though.Perhaps touch an item or swipe from an edge?

item.title: By: Torbjorn
item.dc:creator: Torbjorn
item.description: I have not found how to navigate the DVD menu in Wondershare player. Anyone that can give any input on this?
item.content:encoded: I have not found how to navigate the DVD menu in Wondershare player. Anyone that can give any input on this?

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description: Thats a pain. Did you report it to them? Unfortunately they dont seem to have a public bug tracker.
item.content:encoded: Thats a pain. Did you report it to them? Unfortunately they dont seem to have a public bug tracker.
